Hi all! I‚Äôm Mikkel, Director of Data Science at Dreamdata. üíª

We‚Äôre really excited to see our newest product Content Analytics now live! 

Here‚Äôs some background of why and how we‚Äôve put the product together üëá

Content Analytics is the result of B2B‚Äôs content marketers' struggle with tying their content efforts to pipeline and revenue.

So far, they‚Äôve been unable to answer the simple question: does my content influence the bottom line.

That‚Äôs mostly because existing tools have only been able to track simple conversions happening in the same session.

Content Analytics is tailored fully to the B2B customer journey. Where there are multiple sessions, by multiple users, on multiple devices, over a period of months.

Dreamdata is able to do this because our platform connects the whole go-to-market ecosystem, to track every session by every user of every account; revealing the end-to-end B2B customer journey.

If you have any questions or feedback about Content Analytics, or how we collect and model our data, I‚Äôm here to help! üòÄ
the dream feature <3

Gamechanger! We've been using it for around 3 months now and it helps us make the right decisions when it comes to marketing. If you are fond of coming up with new ideas and testing them, Dreamdata can give you valuable insight to determine if the campaign is a fail or a pass. When you understand the impact of each marketing campaign, you can make a more informed decision to help your business grow. We are very satisfied so far. B2B companies should give this a try.

Congrats, guys! Our team used the first/last click attribution before. But Dreamdata changed the way we do our marketing campaigns.

Imagine knowing what content works, and what doesn't. Getting the whole attribution view allowed us to scrap the campaigns that were not working so well and focus more on those which gets us more leads and conversion. 

It's a challenge to work with new, complex attribution modelling though. But once you get the hang of it and you set to up using correct data, this tool is something that you would want to integrate in your marketing process.

I see this as a powerful attribution tool. Businesses can easily use this to map revenue and conversion from different marketing campaigns.
Dreamdata can track both paid and unpaid channels so once you've set everything, it can provide crucial information on how much each marketing and campaign is generating, the lenth of the sales cycle, where the sales happen, and more. Marketers who love data will love this tool.

Hey Product Hunt üëã

We‚Äôre thrilled to launch our Snippyly SDK! 

With Snippyly SDK, you can make your app multiplayer in 30 mins. It provides these out of the box capabilities: 
‚ö°Ô∏è UI Components: each feature comes with a beautiful customizable UI component. You can place it like any other HTML tag anywhere in your UI and style it the way you want.
‚ö°Ô∏è APIs: if you don't want to use our UI components, you can use the APIs to access raw data to create your own UI. 
‚ö°Ô∏è Backend Infrastructure: we take care of the entire end to end real time infrastructure & ensure that it's fast, performant and secure. 

It is designed to be:
üî• Platform agnostic:  it works well with popular JS frameworks like React, Angular, Vue etc.
üî• White label: we don't put our branding anywhere and want all our features to feel native to your app.
üî• Fully customizable: you can choose only the features you want and style them the way you want.

Would love to hear the use cases that you have in mind for your app. We‚Äôre super excited to see what you build and look forward to your feedback!

Thanks @mwseibel for hunting us.

Hey Builders and Makers üëã,
@SoleneOudet and I are building Snippyly to make the web multiplayer & collaborative üöÄWe are super exited to launch it today!

During covid, the workplace shifted to a remote first world. But 99% of the apps are still single player and not equipped to address remote collaboration needs. With Snippyly, we will change that.

TEAM:
We‚Äôre a team of ex-Googlers. We‚Äôve built several internal collaboration tools and launched products like AR mode in Google Maps & Search and expanded Google Local Services.

FEATURES:
With Snippyly SDK, you can make your app multiplayer in just 30 mins üî•. You can create asynchronous and real time collaboration experiences for your end users:
1. Presence: See who is online on this page right now.
2. Live cursors:  See each other‚Äôs cursor movement live on the page.
3. Contextual comments: Add google docs like comments, voice notes and tag co-workers.
4. Audio huddles: Start Slack-style spontaneous audio conversations with one click. 
5. Real-time state syncing:  See other people‚Äôs changes live without refreshing the page.

USE CASES:
üì± App builders (e.g. Shopify)
Design and product teams can discuss design & copy changes directly inside the app.

‚úâÔ∏è Email marketing & Survey Tools (eg: Mailchimp)
Marketing and products teams can discuss automated journey configurations directly inside the app.

üìä Analytics platforms (eg: Mixpanel)
Analytics and product teams can investigate spikes or drops in metrics directly inside the app.

Get your API key before March 9th to get a special discount (30% off your first year!).

Please ping us with any feedback, ideas or suggestions you may have. ‚ù§Ô∏è

As a devops engineer, this is a must have. It is a super easy way to build great DevOps process.
It‚Äòs interesting!

Define your desired DevOps tools in a single human-readable YAML config file, and at the press of a button (one single command), you will have your whole DevOps toolchain and SDLC workflow set up. Five Minutes. One Command.

Nobody grew up dreaming of building great DevOps processes, even though they're necessary! We wanted to make it as easy, fast, and simple as possible to  configure, launch and manage a personalized and flexible DevOps toolchain, so we built DevStream as an open source product to do exactly that. 

Monolithic DevOps platforms don't fit most agile teams, One-Size-Fits-All == One-Size-Fits-None. 

DevStream lets you choose the pieces you want, and build your own personalized DevOps platform with none of the operational overhead.

If you're just starting up, DevStream makes it easy to get the right products, processes, connections, and automations in place to scale great engineering. 

If you're already established, DevStream equips you to freshen up and enhance the interoperability of your process. 

Is it sexy? Perhaps not. Is it impactful? We think so! Here's to more building, and less of whatever "Ops" is! ;-)

After launching last year, we‚Äôve learned A LOT about what founders and GTM teams need to quickly win and successfully onboard customers. Which brings me to why we‚Äôre all here ü•Åü•Å

To share a gallery of proven sales & onboarding playbooks, curated from the world's top startups and sales/success leaders (Figma, Productboard, YC startups, etc, etc)! üôÄ

I made it because I'm passionate about giving power to people to be able to create their own highly-customised workflows that make them more productive without needing to write a single line of code. I absolutely love Notion - it's one of the most flexible ways for storing and visualising data, which makes it a match made in heaven when paired with Shortcuts - the most intuitive no-code automation tool. I've seen some really creative uses for it so far, some of my favourites: ‚Ä¢ Creating an inventory system using your iPhone as a barcode scanner with Notion as the database backend ‚Ä¢ Personal watch later list, with movies and TV shows being stored with rich metadata ‚Ä¢ Adding new contacts into a CRM using Siri ‚Ä¢ Creating an automatic journalling system which pulls in music listened to that day, workout info, weather etc to create rich Notion pages Some of these I've made into example Shortcuts you can find in the app right now and there'll be lots more I'll be adding in the coming days! Great to see this live! üí• I'm Ste, the lead designer Hardcover and I gotta say that it's been great working with such an amazing team on a product evolving so fast. Check it out and if you have any feedback join the Discord community.

üëã Hey hey Product Hunters!

I‚Äôm Adam, a Co-founder of Hardcover, the social discovery platform for finding new life-changing books.

Last year, Goodreads announced they were discontinuing their API. After using their API for over a decade, I couldn‚Äôt believe it! My years of data would no longer be accessible. I snarkily tweeted that I should build an alternative book platform out of spite for Amazon. 

Nine months, 5 co-founders, 80+ user interviews, and 100s of GB of book data later, we‚Äôre launching our beta and you‚Äôre all invited!

üßô‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Who is Hardcover For

Readers who are constantly on the hunt for new and exciting books. Whether you only read a few books per year or are plowing through dozens each month, no one wants to waste time on books they don‚Äôt love. Hardcover will help you find and keep track of what‚Äôs next on your reading list.

All of your activity on Hardcover can be public, private only to you, or shared with people you follow. Yes, you can be antisocial on our social network too‚Äîwhatever helps you to read more books.

üêâ A Short Story

Many of the readers we‚Äôve talked to have a similar process for finding new books to read. Tell us if this sounds like you or if it doesn‚Äôt.

Whenever you hear about a new book that sparks your curiosity, you search for it. You read a little bit about that book from the top search result‚Äîeither on Amazon or Goodreads. Maybe you read a few reviews, or you make a choice to go in with a fresh mind.

Once you‚Äôre interested in a book the next thought is usually, ‚ÄúWhen do I read it?‚Äù As soon as possible or sometime down the line?

Many readers need a place to keep track of those books‚Äîsomething they do today through Goodreads, in a Google Sheet, or in a bunch of other ways.

At Hardcover, we want to be that place you save all the books you want to read. When you‚Äôre ready to actively seek out new books to read, we‚Äôll show you what your friends are reading, popular lists, and our weekly polls. (ex: ‚ÄúWhat were your favorite childhood books?‚Äù) We also have many more things planned.

We hope you join Hardcover to track what you want to read and stay for the community and book discovery.


üìö What You Can do on Hardcover

Track üìì what you want to read, what you‚Äôve read, and what you‚Äôre reading; including the option to track the date(s) you started and finished a book as well as which format (read or listened).

Confidently üöö  move every book & list in your library from Goodreads to Hardcover.

Follow your üë≠ friends and share what you‚Äôre reading with each other.

Get a üì∞ feed of your friends‚Äô activities and activities for books you‚Äôre interested in.

Create book üèÜ goals‚Äîeither by the number of books or number of pages.

Organize your books into üìö lists and easily find what you‚Äôre looking for.

See üìä stats for lists (and more later) based on a wide variety of data.

Discover books through üìà popular lists, prompts, and social feed.

üìò Join Hardcover Beta

Use the invite code ‚Äúproducthunt‚Äù to activate your account today! Then, say hi by jumping on our Discord or following @hardcoverapp on Twitter. üëã

Hey ProductHunters!!

A big thank you to @de for hunting us!  ¬†

ü§î What is Stand and why did I create it?
Stand provides asynchronous online stand-ups, discussions, mood tracking and accountability for your team.

I primarily built Stand based on my own needs/wants from a product. Leading a small team of designers across multiple time zones, I don‚Äôt want to enforce stand-ups where teams are required to join a call daily. I want the team to be able to focus without interruption but be able to raise questions or concerns in a dedicated space when they need to.

After using Stand for about 4 weeks, it feels great! It hasn‚Äôt completely removed the need for calls (and I didn‚Äôt expect that it would), but it has definitely reduced them and given me a better understanding of what the team are working on, removing blockers and most importantly, how the team are feeling day to day.

üöÄ How long did it take to build?
Around 4 months in total to launch the current MVP here on Product Hunt. This is outside of my busy 9 to 5 role, working across evenings and weekends. I wanted to release an MVP at around the 2 month mark, but overall I am happy with the time it has taken me to design and build Stand from scratch.

üî• Some key features:
Asynchronous stand-ups for your team!
Your team will be reminded to attend the stand-up on the day and time of their choosing (although team admins can also request a time to attend).
All stand-ups have discussions/comments allowing your team to communicate directly and efficiently.
Mood tracking - every team member will be asked how they feel during the stand-up.
Insights - see at a glance your team‚Äôs performance, blockers, questions and moods.
Built with remote teams in mind.
Less time on Zoom or Slack calls.
Happier team members!

ü•≥ 50% off for the Product Hunt community
Use the promo code ProductHunt50 when purchasing a plan to get 50% off the price of a plan forever!

If you have any feedback, I would love to hear it!

Hey heey Product Hunt!

What if you could invest in and own digital real estate on your favorite websites? What if you could fund your startup while aligning your community with your upside? What would the Million Dollar Homepage look like, reimagined in a crypto-native way? 

A few Internet friends came together to reflect on these questions. The result is The Modern Billboard Collective ‚Äì the first experiment in tokenized advertising where you can buy ad space represented as NFTs that are freely tradable. 

If you believe any of our websites will succeed and more people will want to visit it in the future, you can buy a little piece of it now - represented as an NFT on a billboard -  and resell it in the future for a likely profit. As a lot owner, you can upload an image + link out to a URL of your choice. 

Want to promote your company or project? Stick your logo in it.
Want to show off your ape avatar and link to your twitter profile? Do your thing.
Want to rent the ad space to someone else and make $? Dream big.

It‚Äôs the benefits of advertising, the potential upside of an investment, and the feel good vibes of patronage ;)

Our first three billboards are live today:
- Startupy: https://startupy.themodernbillboard.com
- Koodos: https://koodos.themodernbillboard.com
- Coinvise: https://coinvise.themodernbillboard.com

Watch a demo here: https://youtu.be/hFe7UpT-XaU

There are only 48 gridlots available on each billboard. 16 are open today at a fixed price of 0.5 ETH. The remaining lots will be available tomorrow at a higher floor price.

We‚Äôve had so much fun building this and would love to hear your thoughts!

A special thank you to @hnshah for hunting us today üéâ
Hiten, you hunted us when Fellow originally launched in 2019, again for Fellow v2.0, and now for Fellow 3.2. It means so much to have you continually support us along our journey!

Now‚Ä¶ Fellow 3.2 ü§©

You may be wondering, how do we figure out what it is we want to build?

If you could imagine the world‚Äôs greatest meeting host as a person, they are amazing at masterfully crafting the best meetings possible. They make meetings:

‚úÖ Productive 
‚úÖ Effective 
‚úÖ Inclusive
‚úÖ A great use of everyone‚Äôs time
‚úÖ Move work forward 

‚Ä¶and when you come out of them, you are completely energized.

Well, we‚Äôre building Fellow, the software, to do all of that for you and for everybody that uses it. 

Fellow is becoming a smart meeting assistant - and we are looking to build the world‚Äôs greatest meeting assistant!

On that note, we‚Äôre so excited to share with you some of the new additions to Fellow in 3.2:
1) Tags and Enhanced search üè∑
2) Sections ‚ö°Ô∏è
3) Meeting timer ‚è∞
4) New meeting feedback modal üéâ
5) Delegated access üîê
6) Objectives enhancements üí´
7) Okta support üí™

Hey Product Hunt!  üëã  

ü§© Exciting news! We are sharing snippet-based authentication solutions for websites.  ‚ú®

‚≠êÔ∏è Rownd Auth ‚Äì Frictionless authentication and profile management for any website or webapp with a snippet.   We are making this in the open and would love feedback.  


The Problem: 
Authentication is still largely focused on the application and creates a divide across marketing sites (blogs, landing pages, docs) and the actual webapp where the cool stuff happens.  This divide adds needless friction.

== What does Rownd do?  ==
üè†The Rownd Hub (a small widget) is your website‚Äôs authentication and profile tab.  We give end-users a simple way to see their status, what data has been collected, and control over the data.  


‚ö°Ô∏è One snippet for websites and an easy SDK for webapps (mobile app support coming soon).  

‚úÖ Any site.  We work on webflow, wordpress, Jamstack sites fronted by Netlify, custom sites or you can add us to any site you can proxy through cloudflare.  

üåâ Across sites. We can work across your websites. If you have a blog in wordpress and a landing page on webflow, auth will follow the user. 

üó∫Ô∏è User profiles can be created over time across sites and the data is available to the browser for fast customizations and personalizations.

‚ö°Ô∏è No more ‚Äúsign up‚Äù page, get your users into your app faster, let them try what you show them on your marketing pages.

üéä  Privacy first - CCPA and GDPR ready

Why us?
We are a bunch of makers who just got sick of the current auth solutions on the market. They either take too long to set up or they offload profile/PII responsibility back to the developer.  We wanted an all in one solution that we could use for our projects.  

We all come from large IT companies where we did data authentication for some of the largest companies in the US and Europe.  We wanted to take that passion for data security and safety and bring it to the rest of the world.  

What to expect
Everything is snippet based.  We are working on some no-code tools to help set up the auth, but right now you have to modify the actual snippet. We show you how to add auth to any page, how to customize a page based on profile data, and how to send form data to Rownd.   

Give us some feedback!
Please give it a whirl.  We built our onboarding tool in webflow to show you the power of our new auth.  Give it a try!   https://rowndauth.com/producthunt.  We are free for 14 days and then 50% off for the next year if you try us today!  No credit card needed.  We would LOVE feedback.

I'm so impressed by the Mercury Capital team expanding into Venture Debt, helping startups expand their runway and reach as they achieve scale. This is an exciting product that is going to tangibly help many companies get access to capital all while minimizing dilution.

Hi Product Hunt üëã I work on the Capital team and we‚Äôre so excited to publicly launch our venture debt product. 

Through our team's own experience advising startups, launching companies, and talking to Mercury founders, we've seen first-hand the challenges founders face trying to simultaneously run their business and raise money. Unfortunately, raising capital is extremely time-consuming, opaque, and inaccessible to many.

At Mercury, we‚Äôre humbled by how many founders love our core banking product, and we‚Äôre striving to bring that same level of delight and founder-friendly focus to our Capital products. With venture debt and our partners, we‚Äôre taking a big step forward on that journey.

We have a lot of opportunity ahead and exciting improvements in the pipeline. We can‚Äôt wait to learn more about your businesses and explore how we can help you grow.
Congrats on the launch! üöÄ

Hey there hunters üëã I am beyond excited and grateful to be a part of the team helping to launch Mercury Capital and our first product ‚Äì venture debt üéâ

As a long-time banker and lender to startups, I have seen first-hand the important role that debt can play in a company‚Äôs capital stack ‚Äì helping founders and investors win together. However, until now startups have had to suffer through a terrible banking experience in order to access these debt products. Well, that time has changed.

While employed at a bank my team had just won a Venture Debt deal with a company that was currently working with Mercury. When we told the founder that they would have to move all of the company‚Äôs deposits over in order to access the debt ‚Äì to say the least ‚Äì they were not happy and insisted that we allow them to keep Mercury as their primary. After realizing that there was no alternative, the founder reluctantly switched in order to access the capital they needed. This left a huge impression on me that founders and their teams expect more out of their financial partners and that this need is not currently being met.
Insert Mercury Capital.

As a team we are working to build a suite of capital products and tools that can help founders fuel the growth of their businesses. We are doing this by building a tech-enabled lending platform that allows founders to access Mercury Capital products and pair them with other best-in-class capital products from our partners. There is so much opportunity ahead of us, but one thing is for sure ‚Äì expect to see the same type of quality from our Capital product that you now experience with Mercury. We can‚Äôt wait to learn more about your businesses and explore new ways we can help you grow.

Apply at mercury.com/venture-debt/apply

We'd love to know what you think!

Hey hunters üëã

We are excited to reveal what we have been quietly building over the last couple of months. Today, we're adding venture debt to Mercury Capital. 

We have already provided venture debt to high-growth startups backed by some of the world's most recognizable Venture Capital firms. We fund a wide range of companies, whether you're in fintech or flower delivery, pre-revenue, or at a later stage. 

Here's what you can expect with Mercury venture debt:

Competitive rates: Our pricing and structure keep costs low.

Transparent terms: Our loans offer minimal dilution and straightforward payback plans. 

Quick application: We've built a fully online application. Hear back from us within a few days and use your fundraise's documents on hand for diligence.

Flexible financing: Use your loans to grow your business the way you think is best‚Äîwhether that's marketing, hiring, or otherwise.

Venture debt is part of Mercury Capital, our initiative to help founders access financing. It matches your current needs and plans based on details like company stage and size, the industry you operate in, your business model, and growth plans. 

We know raising capital is a big decision. We hope to make it easier for you to grow your business the way you think is best‚Äîwhether that's funding more runway, marketing, hiring, or otherwise. 

Apply at mercury.com/venture-debt

We'd love to know what you think.

It was a lot of fun working with the Mercury Capital team to bring the venture debt product to life. I personally learned so much about the benefits of venture debt compared to other types of capital (hardly any dilution, low interest rates), and love the team‚Äôs mission to digitize and streamline the process. Venture debt is a tool that founders raising VC rounds should really consider - and we‚Äôre proud to make it more accessible.

Mercury venture debt is our first capital product and it's been tested by some awesome founders already. We're looking forward to helping founders get funding that works the way they want it to! My favourite part of this product is how dang easy it is to use. Just like when using a Mercury account, applying for Mercury venture debt is intuitive, quick, and clutter-free. Plus not waiting weeks and weeks to hear back on your application is pretty wonderful. I hope that founders using venture debt get to experience working with a financial partner who's as invested in their success as they are. Congrats to the Capital team on an exciting first step!

Hey everyone, I am an engineer on the Capital team, and I am really excited to be launching venture debt. This is the spiritual successor to our Capital Guide project, and is our first proprietary financing option. The Capital team‚Äôs core philosophy is helping founders to access capital and identify the best cash flow options for their business. 
The team started by focusing on educational materials, and a simple interface for connecting founders and financiers. We created a curated list of vetted partners that primarily funded ecommerce and Saas companies. As we looked into options for startups to extend their runway by stacking debt on top of a recent equity round, we found that the existing options weren‚Äôt up to our standards. Therefore, in line with Mercury‚Äôs broader mission of providing a best in class experience for founders, we decided to create our own offering. While it is still early days for this product, the most exciting part for me is that we are going to be able to collect founder feedback and action it immediately, because we have control of the user experience end to end!

Hello Product Hunt! üëã I‚Äôm Olly, co-founder of SimpleHash. We‚Äôre excited to have Michael hunt this for us!

TL;DR: SimpleHash allows web3 developers to query NFT data from a single API. We index multiple blockchains, take care of edge cases, and can be integrated in a few lines of code.

** The API offers: **

‚úÖ Querying NFTs by contract address, token id, or owner
‚úÖ Getting the transaction history for wallets
‚úÖ Getting the transaction history for NFTs
‚úÖ CDN support for fast media retrieval
‚úÖ Support for Ethereum mainnet, Arbitrum, and Optimism, with Polygon and Solana coming soon
‚úÖ Today, we‚Äôre covering the bulk of standard ERC-721 and 1155 contracts, but expanding our support to bring coverage to non-standard collections and everything else rapidly

** What can I use this for? **

To build exceptional NFT experiences for your users. If you are a developer building a wallet, marketplace, game, metaverse, or other web3 app, we are the easiest way to quickly and reliably query NFT data across chain. Querying blockchains directly is slow, there are many edge cases depending on the contract, and every chain has its nuances. We abstract away all that complexity, and provide a unified schema accessible from simple REST endpoints.

** How can I get it? **

Sign up at https://app.simplehash.com to generate API Keys, and read the docs / play around with the endpoints at https://simplehash.readme.io/reference/overview. While we‚Äôre in our Developer Alpha, the API is free to use (subject to reasonable use). Longer term we‚Äôll have a usage based pricing model, so you‚Äôll only pay for what you use, along with a free tier.

** Want to learn more / provide feedback? **

Follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/SimpleHashInc - we‚Äôll be regularly posting about the fun intricacies and edge cases involved with indexing and serving up all NFT data from multiple blockchains. Also feel free to email us directly at founders@simplehash.com ‚Äî any and all feedback, questions, or requests are more than welcome ‚Äî we‚Äôd love to hear from you, and take feedback and input from our users very seriously!

Hi Product hunt!

We are YC-backed Revery AI and we created a virtual try-on API for anyone to try. Our product lets you place garments on people instantly using only 2-D images. Mix and match different garments and shoes, and select a face that best represents you!

**Common questions**

1. What is the virtual try-on?
Virtual try-on is the ability to put specific garments on digital people to see how it looks on that person.

2. How should I use virtual try-on?
We released our API to let you explore. We found success selling to fashion retailers to improve engagement among shoppers. Small boutiques have also used us to generate model photoshoots when they do not have the resources to set up their own studio. Happy to see how we can help with your use case!

3. How does the technology work?
We use a combination of computer vision techniques such as GANs, inpainting networks, and warping modules to generate realistic images.

4. What kind of garments can I upload?
We require a ghost mannequin garment image or flat lay garment image to work (garment image on a neutral background). We support virtual try-on for a variety of garments, but have issues rendering cropped tops, transparent garments, lingerie, and oversized garments.

5. Does the generated image provide accurate sizing?
No, our technology is meant to be super lightweight, so it does not take sizing into account. We use 2-D garment images and to generate onto 2-D model images. We focus on generating realistic-looking 2-D images that capture the texture, shading, folds, and drape of the garments.

6. Can I upload my face and select my body type?
We are planning to release a face uploading feature soon! Supporting different body shapes is on our roadmap afterwards :)

**Getting started**

Getting started is easy. Head over to https://revery.ai and get started for free!

üëã Hello ProductHunt!

I'm Michael, the product manager behind AdBlock and our new VPN, which we're excited to launch to everyone here.

The team at AdBlock has always been focused on how we can give our users back control of their internet experience. And when we talked to users about what we can do beyond blocking ads, the overwhelming response was for a reliable, intuitive VPN service they could trust. So over the last year, we've been hard at work building exactly that! 

You might be asking yourself, what makes the AdBlock VPN different?

üí∞ Affordable - We have the cheapest monthly and yearly option for a VPN on the market, and there are no gimmicks to lock you into multi year deals.

üòä Intuitive - Like our browser extension, our VPN is designed with simplicity at heart so you can quickly install it, turn it on and forget about it. But if you want more advanced features and info, you can get those easily too!

üîê Private - We've had a long standing policy of tracking as little data as possible and our VPN takes that even further. We don't just subscribe to a no-log policy, but we also limit all data collection on the website and app feature usage, and don't use Google Analytics.

Who loves AdBlock VPN?

üòª We've had a dedicated group of ~2K beta users testing our VPN for the last few months. Their feedback has helped us greatly improve the product quality and experience. Our products are for the user and we always build with your feedback in mind.

What's next for AdBlock VPN?

This is just the starting point! We're going to continue to improve the product experience on our Windows, Mac, iOS, and Android apps. But we're planning on taking it beyond that by leveraging our ad and tracker blocking experience to expand the functionality of the VPN.

Please enjoy the AdBlock VPN and let us know what you think!
‚ù§Ô∏è The AdBlock Team

üëã Hi Product Hunt community!!

If you've ever done research on a car online, chances are you've probably watched a dozen YouTube videos, clicked on several Reddit posts and visited several vehicle marketplaces in the hopes of trying to find information to aid your next decision. This can be exhausting, daunting and difficult to manage at times especially when you have a massive conveyor belt of tabs open on your browser.

The online car market is expected to grow to $723 bn (a 12% jump in 8 years according to Allied Market Research). There could be a greater emphasis on online processes for car shopping. And with a growing supply of vehicle marketplaces to choose from, car shoppers might experience information overload with few ways to consolidate and manage numerous vehicles across different sites that they might be interested in.

The Bumper.com team is very excited to announce a free Chrome extension to help alleviate that problem and we're super excited to share this with you all today!

Introducing Bumper Showroom! It‚Äôs a browser extension to help you save vehicles across the web and view them in one place. It‚Äôs built-in with additional features such as vehicle comparison, details about the specs by VIN and more!

üñ±Ô∏è **One-click.** As you research for cars online, you can save them to your Showroom if we have VIN data on it with one click!

‚ö° **Plug and play!** Add Showroom to your Chrome browser for free. Visit vehicle marketplace sites such as Autotrader, Carfax, Truecar, Cars.com, Carmax, and others to get started.

üîÉ **Compare vehicles side by side.** You can compare up to 3 cars side by side inside your Showroom to help you comparative shop.

üìù **1 free vehicle history report**. New Showroom users who create a free Bumper account can get access to a Bumper vehicle history report, we're an NMVTIS approved data provider. Helping you learn more about a vehicle's history when applicable. Existing Bumper users will continue to get unlimited vehicle history reports.

We're super excited to share this with you all! We truly hope Showroom can be a serviceable tool for online car shoppers by helping people consolidate their car research to save time and effort.  We are excited to know what you think. üöÄ

Cheers!
Peter

Howdy Product Hunters! 
I'd like to introduce my newest company, Thonest! It allows companies to create communities and discussions around their website, service, or product. The idea came from knowing a lot of companies that were doing really well (including my first company) but they didn't have a way for users to connect and talk. 

People use external review websites, to collect positive or negative reviews but there was no platform that just allowed users to talk and discuss the company in a neutral way. 

With Thonest people can engage their existing users and then potential customers can get an idea of what they are going to buy before they do. It also helps foster a sense of community with the existing users and helps with retention and customers service. 

We're excited to see all the different ways Thonest is used and plan on rolling out a lot more features. We would love to know what you think!

Hello folks! I am excited about introducing ApiHome.

What is it ?
It's an OpenAPI based testing tool that runs generated negative test cases

How does it work ?
1. Start with the default template or upload an OpenAPI spec or Postman collection
2. Fix validation errors 
3. Run API Tests

Use-cases:
1. API Inventory
2. Business-logic testing(negative test-cases)
3. Security testing

Why ApiHome?
- Easier to navigate UI
- To the point Spec validation errors let you get documentation out of the way 

Upcoming Features:
- Code repository crawler to discover API assets
- More fuzzing rules & examples to fix validation errors quickly
- CI/CD integration

ApiHome is in Beta and is free to use!
I would love for you guys to give it a shot and share feedback.

Thank you
